sys_update_xml.name: syntax_editor_macro_f1224786db3210104cc2cc303996197d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="syntax_editor_macro"><syntax_editor_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><comments/><name>includega</name><sys_class_name>syntax_editor_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-24 19:22:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>f1224786db3210104cc2cc303996197d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>includega</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>syntax_editor_macro_f1224786db3210104cc2cc303996197d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-24 19:33:28</sys_updated_on><text>getCampus: function () {
  var sysparm_field = this.getParameter('sysparm_field');

  /*--- any code ---*/

  var json = new JSON();
  var results = {
    "value": "any_value")
  };
  if(results) return json.encode(results);
  else return null;           
}</text></syntax_editor_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: syntax_editor_macro_4a90c782db3210104cc2cc30399619ba
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="syntax_editor_macro"><syntax_editor_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><comments>A common pattern of creating  GlideAggragate</comments><name>varagg</name><sys_class_name>syntax_editor_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-24 19:13:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a90c782db3210104cc2cc30399619ba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>varagg</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>syntax_editor_macro_4a90c782db3210104cc2cc30399619ba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-24 19:35:17</sys_updated_on><text>var agg = new GlideAggregate('table_name');
agg.addAggregate('COUNT', 'field');
agg.orderBy('field');
agg.addQuery('field', '>=', 'value');
agg.query();
while (agg.next()) {
    var incidentCount = agg.getAggregate('COUNT', 'field');
}</text></syntax_editor_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: syntax_editor_macro_d3614786db3210104cc2cc303996198c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="syntax_editor_macro"><syntax_editor_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><comments>A common pattern of creating  GlideAjax</comments><name>varga</name><sys_class_name>syntax_editor_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-24 19:17:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>d3614786db3210104cc2cc303996198c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>varga</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>syntax_editor_macro_d3614786db3210104cc2cc303996198c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-24 19:35:44</sys_updated_on><text>var ga = new GlideAjax('include_name');
ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCampus');
ga.addParam('sysparm_field', g_form.getValue("field"));
ga.getXML(updateCampus);

/*Call Back*/
function updateCampus(response) {
  var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
  var clearvalue; 
  if (answer) {
    var returneddata = answer.evalJSON(true);
    g_form.setValue("campus", returneddata.value);
  } else {
    g_form.setValue("campus", clearvalue);
  }
}</text></syntax_editor_macro></record_update>
